caption.p: ZIKV nAb titers. (a) ZIKV nAb titers (NT 50) are shown 12 h following passive transfer of immune serum into AG129 mice. (b) NT 50 titers 18 days following ZIKV challenge. Each data point is the result of a single experiment and in which assay samples were run in triplicate. Bars indicate geometric means. The * symbol indicates a p value of < 0.05, ** a p value of < 0.01, and *** a p value of < 0.001 as determined using the Student's t-test.
